content: OK. Found "repair folder" and that fixed it.
creator: illroute66

content: You didn't say what version you are using. Try this: click the 'write' button and then click 'view>toolbars and see if there is an option such as composition toolbar. IF so, check it. That should restore the send button. If in the write pane you do not see a menu bar with 'view' option, press the Alt key and it should appear.
creator: davidsk
